name: Compressors
description: Mayekawa offers a comprehensive range of compressors with models developed in response to the variety of applications.

name: Cooling Systems
description: Our freezing and refrigeration technology is built on decades of experience in design and installments.

name: Heat Pumps
description: Mayekawa has been manufacturing large-sized air-conditioning heat pumps since 1971 well in advance of our competitors.

name: Freezers
description: Mayekawa offers a range of freezers that will achieve the most efficient freezing conditions suitable for your needs..

name: Gas Compressors
description: Mayekawa's gas compressors' performance and reliability have been proven all around the world, over and over again.

name: Food Robotics
description: Mayekawa is a pioneer of the robotization for meat processing & has developed different kinds of robots for each process

name: Other Equipment
description: Mayekawa offers equipment that improves safety, efficiency and saves energy  in f&b and cold storage facilities worldwide
